name: Santa Racer
description:
This is a very barebones racing game about an elf training to become Santa's delivery helper.

I had to restart multiple times throughout the project because I was have some problems with using Unreal's default chaos vehicle system. I had to ditch it entirely and write my own vehicle movement controller in C++. My little brother helped with some of the graphics including the elf.

The scope was, in retrospect, obviously too large, hence failing the main point of this jam. I should have probably just made it 2d in unity. But, overall I am pretty happy with the result. Most of the time was spent on the movement component, and I am fairly happy with the result of that especially.

Thank you taking the time to play my little game.
